Class yae.Source

A Source represents audio you can play back.

Methods

yae.Source.new (self, filename[, audiotype="stream"[, filetype="internal"]]) Creates a new Source from a filepath.
yae.Source.play (self) Starts playing the Source.
yae.Source.pause (self) Pauses the Source
yae.Source.resume (self) Resumes a paused Source
yae.Source.stop (self) Stops a Source
yae.Source.getType (self) Returns a type of a Source
yae.Source.getVolume (self) Gets the current volume of the Source.
yae.Source.isLooping (self) Returns whether the Source will loop.
yae.Source.isPaused (self) Returns whether the Source is paused.
yae.Source.isPlaying (self) Returns whether the Source is playing.
yae.Source.isStopped (self) Returns whether the Source is stopped.
yae.Source.setLooping (self, looping) Sets whether the Source should loop.
yae.Source.setVolume (self, volume) Sets the current volume of the Source.


Methods

yae.Source.new (self, filename[, audiotype="stream"[, filetype="internal"]])
Creates a new Source from a filepath.

Parameters:

  • self Source
  • filename string The name (and path) of the file.
  • audiotype string Type of the audio. (default "stream")
  • filetype string Type of the file (default "internal")

Returns:

    Source A new Source that can play the specified audio.

Usage:

    source = Source(filename, audiotype, filetype)
yae.Source.play (self)
Starts playing the Source.

Parameters:

  • self Source

Usage:

    Source\play!
yae.Source.pause (self)
Pauses the Source

Parameters:

  • self Source

Usage:

    Source\pause!
yae.Source.resume (self)
Resumes a paused Source

Parameters:

  • self Source

Usage:

    Source\resume!
yae.Source.stop (self)
Stops a Source

Parameters:

  • self Source

Usage:

    Source\stop!
yae.Source.getType (self)
Returns a type of a Source

Parameters:

  • self Source

Returns:

    string Type of a Source ("static" or "stram")

Usage:

    type = Source\getType!
yae.Source.getVolume (self)
Gets the current volume of the Source.

Parameters:

  • self Source

Returns:

    number Volume of a Source

Usage:

    volume = Source\getVolume!
yae.Source.isLooping (self)
Returns whether the Source will loop.

Parameters:

  • self Source

Returns:

    bool True if the Source will loop, false otherwise.

Usage:

    loop = Source\isLooping!
yae.Source.isPaused (self)
Returns whether the Source is paused.

Parameters:

  • self Source

Returns:

    bool True if the Source is paused, false otherwise.

Usage:

    paused = Source\isPaused!
yae.Source.isPlaying (self)
Returns whether the Source is playing.

Parameters:

  • self Source

Returns:

    bool True if the Source is playing, false otherwise.

Usage:

    playing = Source\isPlaying!
yae.Source.isStopped (self)
Returns whether the Source is stopped.

Parameters:

  • self Source

Returns:

    bool True if the Source is stopped, false otherwise.

Usage:

    stopped = Source\isStopped!
yae.Source.setLooping (self, looping)
Sets whether the Source should loop.

Parameters:

  • self File
  • looping bool True if the source should loop, false otherwise.

Usage:

    Source\setLooping looping
yae.Source.setVolume (self, volume)
Sets the current volume of the Source.

Parameters:

  • self File
  • volume number The volume for a Source, where 1.0 is normal volume. Volume cannot be raised above 1.0.

Usage:

    Source\setVolume volume
